Button Molecule
├── Color Atoms
│   ├── Primary-600 (bg gradient start)
│   ├── Primary-500 (bg gradient end)
│   ├── White (text color)
│   └── Primary-400/50 (focus ring)
├── Spacing Atoms
│   ├── px-6 (horizontal padding)
│   ├── py-3 (vertical padding)
│   └── gap-2 (icon-text gap)
├── Typography Atoms
│   ├── text-base (font size)
│   ├── font-medium (font weight)
│   └── font-body (font family: Inter)
├── Border Radius Atom
│   └── rounded-xl (12px)
├── Shadow Atoms
│   ├── shadow-lg (default)
│   └── shadow-xl (hover)
├── Icon Atom (optional)
│   └── lucide-react icon component
├── Loading Spinner Atom (conditional)
│   └── SVG with animate-spin
└── Transition Atoms
    ├── transition-all
    └── duration-200

Which button variant should I use?

├─ Is this the MOST important action on the page?
│  └─ YES → variant="primary" (MAX 1 per visible area)
│     └─ Use size="lg" for payment/checkout
│
├─ Is this a destructive/dangerous action?
│  └─ YES → variant="danger"
│     └─ ALWAYS show confirmation modal
│
├─ Is this an alternative/secondary important action?
│  └─ YES → variant="secondary"
│     └─ Can have 2-3 on same page
│
├─ Is this a cancel/back/dismiss action?
│  └─ YES → variant="outline" or "ghost"
│     └─ Use "outline" if needs more emphasis
│     └─ Use "ghost" for subtle actions
│
└─ Is this a pure navigation action (no processing)?
   └─ YES → Use <Link> component instead, not Button

// WRONG: Two primary buttons competing for attention
// CORRECT: One primary, one secondary

// WRONG: Direct deletion without confirmation
<Button variant="danger" onClick={deleteAccount}>
  Delete Account
</Button>

// CORRECT: Show confirmation modal first
<Button variant="danger" onClick={() => setShowConfirm(true)}>
  Delete Account
</Button>

// WRONG: No accessible name
<Button variant="ghost">
  <Edit />
</Button>

// CORRECT: Includes aria-label
<Button variant="ghost" aria-label="Edit transaction">
  <Edit />
</Button>

// WRONG: Button for navigation
<Button variant="primary" onClick={() => navigate('/dashboard')}>
  Go to Dashboard
</Button>

// CORRECT: Use Link component
<Link to="/dashboard" className="btn-primary">
  Go to Dashboard
</Link>

// WRONG: User doesn't know why it's disabled
<Button variant="primary" disabled>
  Submit
</Button>

// CORRECT: Show tooltip or helper text
<Tooltip content="Complete all required fields to continue">
  <Button variant="primary" disabled>
    Submit
  </Button>
</Tooltip>
